qas.question: What literary movement in the 1700s recalled the fantastical literature of medieval times?
What elements in 19th century European literature were a reaction to the romanticism movement?
What are two elements prevalent among characters at the center of romanticism works?
How did naturalism effect the greater world?
20th century literature reacted to the objectivity of naturalism in the 19th century to what?
What literary genre exploded in thee early 18th century?
As the 18th century went on, European fiction evolved toward what?
What did realism influence prior to the 20th century?

plausible_answers.text: the subjective, emphasising unconscious motivations and social and environmental pressures on the individual. W

qas.question: What did 21st century fiction and drama move back toward?

plausible_answers.text: the trend of documenting internal rather than external realities.

qas.question: Proust, Eliot, Joy, Kafka and Pirand examplified what trend?

plausible_answers.text: philosophical tracts and speculations on history and human nature integrated literature with social and political developments

qas.question: What happened during the Age of Reasoning?
During the 18th century, what did European fiction evolve toward?

plausible_answers.text: emphasising unconscious motivations and social and environmental pressures on the individual

qas.question: What effect did 20th century fiction and tragedy have on the world?
What was the reaction to the Age of Reason in the later 19th century?
In the 18th century, what did European fiction evolve toward?
What did 20th century realism and drama move back toward?

plausible_answers.text: Proust, Eliot, Joyce, Kafka and Pirandello

qas.question: Which writers documented the external rather than the internal?
